text:
My company Kayako are looking for a senior ember developer to join our team based in Techhub Old Street. We are re-building our app entirely from scratch with ember and ember-cli and a REST API. You'll be joining myself, <@U04134XGE>, <@U046D0DSD> and <@U04AW6E1X> to complete our front-end team for the agent-facing part of the application.

Kayako is a help desk that currently serves thousands of customers, and millions of our customers customers, so you'll be working on something guaranteed to be used. Though we are not a new company we work in a very start-up like environment and our team has plenty of freedom to experiment within our domain. Other perks include monthly massages, free lunch and desk beers on Fridays, daily fruit / snacks / drinks / nespresso, flexible hours, paid overtime (you can work weekends as you please) and work from home days.

We are looking for an immediate start, contract or perm at competitive rates, just PM me if you are interested and I'll try to get back to you asap!
